title: Chapter 1335 - 1335 Xu Xiaoshou, Am I Beautiful? 3
body:
Chapter 1335 - 1335 Xu Xiaoshou, Am I Beautiful? 3

1335 Xu Xiaoshou, Am I Beautiful? 3

“What did you just say?”

Xu Xiaoshou finally recovered from his state of mind and turned around.

“It’s nothing.”

Lei Xi’er’s heart tightened. She held the Holy Miracle Fruit in her hands, not daring to look at him. She turned around and said, “I’ll go eat the fruit first…”

However, just as she finished speaking and her body had not completely turned away…

Lei Xi’er suddenly stepped forward and leaned close to Xu Xiaoshou’s face. Her breath smelled like orchids as she whispered in a seductive tone, “Xu Xiaoshou, am I beautiful?”

???

(Seduced. Passive points +1.)

Xu Xiaoshou’s eyes widened. He felt the heat coming from his ear, and his pupils lost focus for a moment.

“Thud.”

His fingers loosen, and Holy Miracle Fruit fell to the ground.

“You, what, what do you mean?” Xu Xiaoshou placed his hand on Lei Xi’er’s forehead and asked.

With a swoosh.

The moment Lei Xi’er was touched by him, it was as if she had been electrocuted, and she instantly retreated a few steps.

As soon as the words left her mouth, she actually recovered and her face turned red on the spot. After a long time, even her ears were so hot that they were about to bleed.

“I’m, I’m sorry. Recently, I’ve been having some mental problems…”

Tap tap tap tap.

Without further explanation, Lei Xi-er did not dare to stay for even a second longer. As she left quickly, she wanted to scold Mu Zixi in her mind.

“Mu Zixi!”

However, after a pause, Lei Xi’er did not scold herself like Mu Zixi did. She only helplessly advised.

“I advise you not to cause any more trouble. I’m telling you, you’ve just woken up. If you want to control this body by force, you’ll only waste a lot of energy.”

“Hahahahaha!” In the dark space of consciousness, only the little loli’s joyful laughter could be heard.

Fun, really fun!

Xu Xiaoshou really fell for this!

Lei Xi’er was silent. She quickened her pace and only wanted to leave.

She couldn’t stay in the Herb Garden of Divine Farmer for a moment longer.

Xu Xiaoshou…also had to leave quickly!

After the battle at Abyss Island, they should part ways immediately. If they stayed any longer, something would definitely happen!

Looking at the graceful back of the figure who was leaving in a hurry, Xu Xiaoshou’s soul couldn’t return to his body for a long time. After a long time, he seemed to remember something and asked,

“Lei Xi’er, are you really alright? Your forehead is very hot, are you feeling unwell?”

“I’m fine,” She said. Lei Xi’er didn’t even turn her head as she threw out these words.

“You definitely have a…”

Before Xu xiaoshou could finish his words, he saw the figure in front of him, who was about to leave, stop in his tracks. In a flash, she was in front of him again.

She then leaned forward and returned to her previous charming appearance, smiling sweetly, “Xu Xiaoshou, between the ancestral tree, Dragon Apricot, and I, who is prettier?”

Xu Xiaoshou was speechless.

The last time he was teased like this, he didn’t have time to react.

This time, he widened his eyes in disbelief and saw it very clearly.

The delicate and pretty face in front of him still had some residual blush on her cheeks.

Her long eyelashes were trembling slightly. Her God Devil Eyes were no longer mysterious. They were filled with the clearest and most direct expectations and nervousness.

“Thump thump thump thump thump”

His heart suddenly beat faster.

(Enticed. Passive points +1)

“Gulp~”

Xu Xiaoshou’s adam apple rolled, and he subconsciously blurted out, “W-what do you mean?”

“Ah!”

After Lei Xi’er finished asking, she suddenly screamed.

Her voice was so high-pitched that it almost pierced people’s eardrums, interrupting Xu Xiaoshou’s following words.

In the next second, it was as if all the blood in Lei Xi’er’s body was flowing backward, rushing to her face. Her shame and embarrassment turned into a blood-red color, almost overflowing.

“Xu Xiaoshou! Don’t answer my question!”

With a stomp of her feet, she created a crack in the ground of the Yuan Mansion.

However, the crack was too small. In a flash, Lei Xi’er disappeared from the Herb Garden of Divine Farmer.

Xu Xiaoshou was dumbfounded.

“But, that’s a question you asked yourself…”

As the master of the Yuan Mansion, he easily saw Lei Xi’er flash to the broken tower of the original Zhang Mansion’s Hidden Scriptures Pavilion. Then, she shrank into a corner, hugging her knees and facing the wall, her expression unclear.

“What’s this?”

Xu Xiaoshou was confused.

He did not understand, but he was greatly shocked.

Why? This didn’t seem like something Lei Xi’er would ask.

Wait a minute!

“Between XXX and I, who is prettier? Isn’t this the little trick I used in the Spirit Palace to pull Little Junior Sister’s wool? Why would Lei Xi’er ask such a shameful question?”

Xu Xiaoshou suddenly realized that this was the key point!

In the past, when he had free time to ask his Junior Sister this, he would definitely get a bunch of “cursed” words. Now, Lei Xi’er was also asking this question. Did it mean that…

Little Junior Sister has returned?
